scripts.format: bun run format:gleam && bun run format:ts && bun run minify:css
scripts.dev-ts: bun run build && bun run start
scripts.dev-gleam: ln ./frontend/build/dev/javascript/prelude.mjs ./frontend/prelude.mjs; bun run build-with-gleam && bun run start
scripts.watch-ts: bun  x nodemon -e ts,rs,gleam,svg,handlebars,hb,pcss,css --ignore './shared/build/**'  --ignore './frontend/build/**'  --ignore './backend/build/**' --ignore './backend/priv/generated/**' --exec bun run dev-ts
scripts.watch-gleam: bun  x nodemon -e ts,rs,gleam,svg,handlebars,hb,pcss,css --ignore './shared/build/**'  --ignore './frontend/build/**'  --ignore './backend/build/**'  --ignore './backend/priv/generated/**' --exec bun run dev-gleam
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./backend/node_modules/ && rm -rf ./frontend/node_modules/ && rm -rf ./frontend-ts/node_modules/ && rm -rf ./backend/priv/generated && mkdir -p ./backend/priv/generated/css && mkdir -p ./backend/priv/generated/js && cd backend && gleam clean && cd ../frontend && gleam clean && cd ../shared && gleam clean
